reference_text: Open the homework dashboard.
Show me today's assignments.
Send a reminder to parents.
Start a quick attendance check.
Read the latest class message.
Open Grade 6 mathematics.
Create a short spelling quiz.
Share this note with staff.
Mark this task as complete.
Save this response for later.
Please summarize this learner progress report in two sentences.
Draft a polite message to parents about tomorrow's test schedule.
Generate three revision questions for natural sciences grade seven.
Help me rewrite this instruction so younger learners can follow it.
List the main errors in this paragraph and suggest corrections.
Give me a short lesson opener for fractions and mixed numbers.
Create a five minute warm up activity for reading comprehension.
Suggest a parent meeting agenda focused on attendance and homework.
Turn this bullet list into a clear classroom announcement.
Explain the difference between area and perimeter with examples.
I need a complete but concise classroom plan for tomorrow that includes a five minute starter, a guided teaching segment, independent practice, and a short exit ticket for grade five mathematics.
Please analyze this assignment brief and rewrite it in plain language while keeping the original expectations, marking criteria, and submission deadline completely clear for parents and learners.
Create a structured intervention message for a learner who missed multiple homework tasks, including encouragement, specific next steps, and a request for parent confirmation by the end of the week.
Prepare a professional update I can share with staff explaining the latest assessment timeline changes, the moderation checkpoints, and the responsibilities expected from each grade level team.
Help me draft a short principal report that summarizes attendance trends, highlights at risk classes, and recommends two practical actions we can implement immediately next month.
Write a supportive feedback response for a parent who is worried about reading progress, and include one home activity, one classroom strategy, and one follow up check in date.
Generate a focused revision plan for grade eight science over the next seven days with daily goals, brief practice tasks, and a final confidence check before the assessment.
Convert these rough meeting notes into a clean communication update with clear headings, action owners, and realistic due dates so the team can execute without confusion.
I want a student friendly explanation of how to structure an argumentative paragraph with topic sentence, evidence, and conclusion using examples connected to school life.
Please produce a one page communication that outlines our homework policy, late submission process, and support channels for families who need help this term.
Open messages and start a new chat with the grade seven team.
Find the learner named Ava Mokoena and show current attendance.
Schedule a reminder for Friday at 2 PM for report moderation.
Switch to tutor mode and ask one diagnostic math question.
Export this response as a PDF and save it to my dashboard.
Search CAPS curriculum for grade six electricity outcomes.
Create a quick call room for staff planning now.
Open principal analytics and focus on attendance trend lines.
Start voice dictation and append to the current draft message.
Send this update to Ms. Ndlovu at Young Eagles K-12.
Share the CAPS memo with Grade 4 and Grade 5 teachers.
Add PTA meeting notes to the PDF folder.
Confirm whether STEM club starts at 15:30 tomorrow.
Message Mr. Jacobs about the SASAMS import issue.
Create a report for IQMS review and SGB follow up.
Tag the note for HR, IT, and ICT support teams.
Record that learner ID AB-2047 submitted task two.
Reference room B12 and lab C3 in the safety notice.
Maak die huiswerkblad oop.
Wys vandag se take vir graad ses.
Stuur ’n boodskap aan ouers.
Begin ’n vinnige bywoningstoets.
Stoor hierdie antwoord asseblief.
Som asseblief hierdie vorderingsverslag in twee sinne op.
Skryf ’n vriendelike boodskap oor die toetsrooster vir môre.
Gee drie hersieningsvrae vir natuurwetenskap graad sewe.
Verduidelik die verskil tussen oppervlakte en omtrek eenvoudig.
Maak hierdie aankondiging duidelik vir jong leerders.
Ek benodig ’n volledige maar kort klasplan vir môre met ’n inleiding, begeleide onderrig, onafhanklike oefening en ’n vinnige afsluitingsvraag vir graad vyf wiskunde.
Herskryf hierdie opdrag in eenvoudige taal maar behou die vereistes, assesseringskriteria en die sperdatum sodat ouers en leerders dit maklik kan verstaan.
Stel ’n professionele personeelopdatering op oor die nuwe assesseringstydlyn, moderasiekontrolepunte en elke span se verantwoordelikhede vir hierdie kwartaal.
Skryf ’n ondersteunende terugvoerboodskap vir ’n ouer wat bekommerd is oor leesvordering met een tuisaktiwiteit en ’n opvolgdatum.
Skep ’n sewe dae hersieningsplan vir graad agt wetenskap met daaglikse doelwitte, kort oefeninge en ’n finale gereedheidstoets.
Open boodskappe en begin ’n nuwe gesprek met die graad sewe span.
Soek die leerder met die naam Lwazi Maseko en wys bywoning.
Skeduleer ’n herinnering vir Vrydag om 14:00 vir moderasie.
Skakel na tutor-modus en vra een diagnostiese vraag.
Voer hierdie antwoord uit as ’n PDF en stoor dit.
Stuur die CAPS-memo aan graad vier en vyf onderwysers.
Bevestig die STEM-klub tyd vir môre om 15:30.
Merk hierdie nota vir HR en ICT ondersteuning.
Verwys na lokaal B12 en laboratorium C3 in die kennisgewing.
Vula ikhasi lomsebenzi wasekhaya.
Bonisa imisebenzi yanamuhla yebanga lesithupha.
Thumela umlayezo kubazali.
Qala ukuhlola ukubakhona okusheshayo.
Gcina le mpendulo manje.
Ngicela ufingqe lo mbiko wenqubekela phambili ngemiusho emibili.
Bhala umlayezo onobungane kubazali mayelana nohlelo lovivinyo lwakusasa.
Nika imibuzo emithathu yokubuyekeza yesayensi yebanga lesikhombisa.
Chaza umehluko phakathi kwendawo nomjikelezo ngendlela elula.
Lungisa lesi saziso ukuze abafundi abancane basiqonde.
Ngidinga uhlelo lwekilasi oluphelele kodwa olufushane lwakusasa olunezethulo ezimfushane, ukufundisa okuqondisiwe, ukuzilolonga ngokuzimela kanye nombuzo wokuphetha webanga lesihlanu lezibalo.
Sicela ubhale kabusha lo myalelo ngolimi olulula kodwa ugcine okulindelekile, izindlela zokumaka, nosuku lokugcina ukuze abazali nabafundi baqonde kahle.
Lungiselela isibuyekezo sabasebenzi esichaza izinguquko zeshejuli yokuhlola, amaphuzu okuhlola ekumoderetheni, nemisebenzi yeqembu ngalinye kule kota.
Bhala impendulo esekelayo kumzali okhathazekile ngenqubekela phambili yokufunda bese ufaka umsebenzi wasekhaya owodwa nosuku lokulandela.
Dala uhlelo lokubuyekeza lwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa lwesayensi yebanga lesishiyagalombili olunemigomo yansuku zonke nemisebenzi emifushane.
Vula imiyalezo bese uqala ingxoxo entsha neqembu lebanga lesikhombisa.
Thola umfundi ogama lakhe lingu-Anele Dlamini bese ubonisa ukubakhona.
Hlela isikhumbuzi sangoLwesihlanu ngo-14:00 sokumoderetha.
Shintshela kumodi yomfundisi ubuze umbuzo owodwa wokuhlola.
Khipha le mpendulo njenge-PDF bese uyayigcina.
Thumela i-CAPS memo kothisha bebanga lesine nelesihlanu.
Qinisekisa isikhathi se-STEM club sakusasa ngo-15:30.
Maka leli nothi le-HR ne-ICT support.
Beka amareferensi egumbi B12 nelabhorethri C3 esazisweni.
Vula iphepha lomsebenzi wasekhaya.
Bonisa imisebenzi yanamhlanje yeBanga 6.
Thumela umyalezo kubazali.
Qalisa ukuhlola ukubakhona ngokukhawuleza.
Gcina le mpendulo ngoku.
Nceda ushwankathele le ngxelo yenkqubela ngemigca emibini.
Bhala umyalezo onobubele kubazali malunga neshedyuli yovavanyo lwangomso.
Nika imibuzo emithathu yokuphinda yesayensi yeBanga 7.
Chaza umahluko phakathi kommandla nomjikelezo ngendlela elula.
Lungisa esi saziso ukuze abafundi abancinci basiqonde.
Ndifuna isicwangciso sekilasi esicacileyo kodwa esifutshane sangomso esiquka isingeniso semizuzu emihlanu, ukufundisa okukhokelwayo, umsebenzi ozimeleyo, kunye nombuzo wokuphela weBanga 5 lezibalo.
Nceda ubhale kwakhona lo myalelo ngolwimi olulula kodwa ugcine okulindelweyo, indlela yokumakisha, kunye nomhla wokugqibela ukuze abazali nabafundi baqonde kakuhle.
Lungiselela uhlaziyo lwabasebenzi oluchaza utshintsho kwishedyuli yovavanyo, amanqanaba omodereshini, kunye noxanduva lweqela ngalinye kule kota.
Bhala impendulo exhasayo kumzali oxhalabileyo ngenkqubela yokufunda uze ungeze umsebenzi wasekhaya omnye nomhla wokulandelela.
Yenza isicwangciso seentsuku ezisixhenxe sokuphinda isayensi yeBanga 8 esineenjongo zemihla ngemihla nemisebenzi emifutshane.
Vula imiyalezo uqalise incoko entsha neqela leBanga 7.
Fumana umfundi ogama linguLitha Mbeki ubonise ukubakhona.
Cwangcisa isikhumbuzi sangoLwesihlanu ngo-14:00 semodereshini.
Tshintshela kwi-tutor mode ubuze umbuzo omnye wokuhlola.
Khupha le mpendulo njenge-PDF uze uyigcine.
Thumela i-CAPS memo kootitshala beBanga 4 neBanga 5.
Qinisekisa ixesha le-STEM club langomso ngo-15:30.
Maka le nqaku le-HR ne-ICT support.
Bhekisa kwigumbi B12 nelab C3 kwisaziso sokhuseleko.
